credit_line: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
title: Design for Knotted Pile Wall Hanging with Menorah
medium: Brush and gouache, watercolor, gold and silver paint, graphite traces on heavy textured white paper
description: On multicolored, patterned background, a slim seven-branched menorah in yellow, gold and persimmon with two inward-leaning silver braches on either side.
name: Drawing
